oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Camel Rock & Roll Dance Party - 1956-03-31 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: CBS Rock 'N' Roll Dance Party program sponsored by Camel cigarettes, 1956-03-31 part 2. Hosted by Alan Freed with announcer Bern Bennett, starring Count Basie and his Orchestra with vocalist Joe Williams, and featuring Sunny Gale, and the Rover Boys featuring Billy Albert. Produced and directed by Lou Melamed.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Joe Williams; Count Basie Orchestra; Sunny Gale; Rover Boys; Billy Albert
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Alan Freed introduces Joe Williams -- Roll 'Em Pete (Joe Williams, Count Basie Orchestra) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Alan Freed introduces Sunny Gale -- Rock And Roll Wedding (Sunny Gale) -- Alan Freed introduces the Rover Boys -- Come To Me (Rover Boys, Billy Albert) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Alan Freed introduces Count Basie and his Orchestra -- Big Red (Count Basie Orchestra) -- Closing statement (Alan Freed) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Bern Bennett) -- CBS network ID -- Program schedule announcement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; WCBS (Radio station : New York, N.Y.); R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company; Camel rock 'n roll dance party (Radio program); Freed, Alan; Bennett, Bern, 1921-2014; Basie, Count, 1904-1984; Count Basie Orchestra; Williams, Joe, 1918-1999; Gale, Sunny (Vocalist); Rover Boys (Musical group); Albert, Billy (Vocalist); Melamed, Louis
